item.description:
Dear Spiritual members,
How are you?
Spring is almost at the corner. There is an old saying" The best plan for the year is in spring".

This month we are going to share the topic about " interbeing". which means all the beings in deep level are connected. What can we do and what can we reach the better way for this world?

Last month we had a great discussion about how the inner mindset affects the environment and others. Thank you all for joining us. We shared a lot of information. I learned and gain a lot from all of you!

This month, we are going to discuss further about how to practice in our daily life. This is a wonderful topic to benefit and improve the whole world. Let's share more and create a better world together.

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experience.

Looking forward to meeting you!
About this Meetup Group
item.name: Westborough Spiritual March Meetup
